content.rendered:
Assistant Manager – Deputy Manager

Designation

Senior Engineer/ Asssistant Manager / Deputy Manager

Job Location

Ahmedabad, Delhi, Mumbai

Qualification

B E Civil with ME/ MTech in the field of Structure Engineering

Industry

Civil Engineering- Infrastructure

Comunication Skills

Good

Experience

2 to 10 years

Job Profile

  • Design and detailing of the Railway infrastructure such as Minor bridges, retaining wall and box culverts.
  • Design and detailing of the drains, cable trenches, boundary wall and buildings.
  • Working with engineers and other professionals to Precast design and drawings that meet project specifications.
  • Coordinate structural design activities and follow up with interdepartmental.

Skills Required

  1. Proficiency in Staad pro software.
  2. MS Office, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint
  3. MIDAS and Etabs will be added advantages
